snippet.title: Inkesis (Trailer 2023)
snippet.description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players: 1
Genre: Adventure & Puzzle Game

Help Ink, our hero, fight the evil that consumes the forgotten Library of Arga. Collect Knowledge and control your environment to explore this grandiose building, uncover secrets, and forge your own path in this adventure and puzzle game! But beware, your greed could lead you astray...

--

Aidez Ink, notre héros, à combattre le mal qui ronge la Bibliothèque d’Arga. Accumulez des Connaissances et contrôlez votre environnement pour explorer cet édifice grandiose ! Percez ses secrets et forgez votre propre chemin, mais prenez garde, votre avidité pourrait bien vous égarer...

Ready to play Inkesis? Visit https://isart-digital.itch.io/inkesis
Follow the development on : https://twitter.com/inkesis

Producer: Benjamin BAN | Marine BAYET
Game Artists: Margot BERIC | Valentine COLLINO | Alyssia GALLEZE | Liv JENGER | Maélis LEVASTRE | Matthias ROUSSEAU
Game Designers: Jérémy BECICA | Théotime LAWSON | Céline TOHIER
Game Designers & Programmers: Pierre-Louis CUKERMAN | Romain HITIER
Game Programmers: Nicolas DEPREZ | Antony GAVELLE
Music & Sound Designer: Victor BICK
